title: Stalking in the New Year
description: She captivated me from the moment I first saw her up on the stage dancing her little heart out.She's not like the other nightclub dancers. She moves with grace and fluidity. A ballerina. Poetry in motion.Her long red hair and luminous green eyes hold me spellbound, calling to me. I'll die if I don't watch her. She's my obsession. And tonight, on New Year's Eve...She's mine.
author: Emma Bray
